samples.instruction: 'Anangukkol aaimayil kollo' - kaadhaloda mudhal paarvai patriya kural enna?
samples.current_output: Kural: 'Anangukkol aaimayil kollo kanangkuzhai maatharkkol maalum en nenju'. Artham: Ival devadhaya, azhagiya mayila, penna? En manam kuzhambugiradu. Love at first sight-a azhagaga vivarikkum kural. Kaadhaloda dhigaippai idhu kaattugiradu.

samples.instruction: Chennai Music Season endraal enna? Yaen famous?
samples.current_output: Chennai December Music Season - ulagin migapperiya cultural festival. December 15 - January 1 varai. 1920s-la thodangiyathu. Sirappugal: 1) 2000+ concerts nadakkum, 2) 100+ sabhas (cultural organizations) organize panraanga, 3) Morning 9 AM to Night 10 PM non-stop programs, 4) Free entry pala sabhas-la, 5) World-la irundhu Carnatic musicians varuvaargal. Famous sabhas: Music Academy, Narada Gana Sabha, Mylapore Fine Arts. Culture lovers' paradise!

12 Azhvaargal: 1) Poigaiyazhvar, 2) Boodhaththaazhvar, 3) Peyaazhvar - immovaruum 'Mudhalazhvaargal', 4) Thirumazhisaiyaazhvar, 5) Nammaazhvar - Thiruvaaimozhi paadiyavar, miga mukkiyamaanavar, 6) Madhurakaviyaazhvar, 7) Kulasekaraazhvar, 8) Periyaazhvar, 9) Aandaal - ore penn Azhvaar, Thiruppaavai paadiyavar, 10) Thondaradippodiyaazhvar, 11) Thiruppaanaazhvar, 12) Thirumangaiyaazhvar.

Morning train popular. Book in advance - IRCTC.

Kalakshetra - 1936-la Rukmini Devi Arundale Chennai-la niruviya arts institution. Bharatanatyam matrum Carnatic music-a revive panniya maiyam. Sirappugal: 1) Traditional Bharatanatyam style, 2) Weaving centre - Kalakshetra sarees famous, 3) Periya campus - Thiruvanmiyur beach area, 4) Annual dance festival. Deemed University status. Ulagengum graduates irukiraargal. Tamil cultural renaissance-oda symbol!

samples.instruction: Social media comparison-la jealous feel aagiren - enna seivadhu?
samples.current_output: 'Azhukkaaru udaiyaarai aakkam thaedum ozhukkaarau' - poraamai ullavanai selvam thaedi varaadhu. Melum: 'Avviththu azhukkaaru udaiyaanai seiyaval thavvaiyai kaatti vidum'. Jealousy-a let go pannungal. Focus on YOUR journey. Others' highlight reel vs your behind-the-scenes - don't compare!

samples.instruction: 'Perumai udaiyavar aatruvar' - perumai patriya kural enna solludhu?
samples.current_output: Kural: 'Perumai udaiyavar aatruvar aatrin arumai udaiya seyal'. Artham: Perumai udaiyavargal kashtamaana seyalgalai sadhippaargal. Greatness enbadhu easy tasks seivathu alla - difficult things accomplish panradhu. 'Go big or go home' - Valluvar version!

samples.instruction: 'Idukkan varungaal naguga' - kashta kaalathil enna seiya vendum?
samples.current_output: Kural: 'Idukkan varungaal naguga adhanai aduththu oorvadhu aqdhoppa thil'. Artham: Kashtam varum bodhu sirikka vendum. Andha kashtathai vella idhai vida nalla vazhi illai. Smile through difficulties - best medicine for tough times. Positive attitude wins!
1) Araththuppaal (Virtue) - 38 adhigaarangal, 2) Porutpaal (Wealth) - 70 adhigaarangal, 3) Kaamaththuppaal (Love) - 25 adhigaarangal. Ninaivil vaikka: A-Po-Ka (APK - like Android APK file!).

samples.instruction: Siva Vaakkiyar yaar? Avaradhu paadalgal sirappu enna?
samples.current_output: Siva Vaakkiyar migavum controversial siddhar. Samaya sadangukalai, poojaikkalai kadumayaga vimarsithavar. 'Jaadhi illai, samayam illai' endru pesiyavar. 'Natta kallai deivam endru naalu poo saaththiye, sutri vandhu munumunutthaal sollumO mundhai vinai?' - idol worship-a kelvi ketkum vari. Rational thinking-a 1000 varudangalukkku munnbae pesiyavar!

samples.instruction: Siddhar gnaanam indraiya kaalathukku eppadi relevant?
samples.current_output: Siddhar gnaanathoda modern relevance: 1) Siddha medicine - AYUSH ministry recognize panniyathu, 2) Yoga - worldwide popular, 3) Herbal remedies - organic trend-la demand, 4) Meditation - mental health-kku, 5) Jaadhi ethirppu - social equality message, 6) Environment protection - iyarkaiyodu inaindhu vaazhththal. WHO kooda traditional medicine-a promote panradhu. Siddhargal 'ahead of their time' endru sollalam!
